We've tweaked our checkout system for effortless shopping and added Trend Snap, a new feature that makes it easy to see, shop and slay a new look instantly. Trend Snap allows you to effortlessly shop a look you love, without any of the digging. Here's how it works: 
1. Snap a pic with the Express App.
2. Our smart image recognition searches for similar items.
3. Shop the items (with our streamlined checkout system).
4. Slay your new look.

3. Shop the items (with our streamlined checkout system).
4. Slay your new look.

We've tweaked our checkout system for effortless shopping and added Trend Snap, a new feature that makes it easy to see, shop and slay a new look instantly. Trend Snap allows you to effortlessly shop a look you love, without any of the digging. Here's how it works: 
1. Snap a pic with the Express App.
2. Our smart image recognition searches for similar items.
3. Shop the items (with our streamlined checkout system).
4. Slay your new look.

Fresh new season, fresh new update. We've given the Express App a spring makeover based on your feedback. Check out our improved shopping experience and tons more. Download it now & see what's new!

Improved navigation for seamless shopping
Sign in to easily view your EXPRESS NEXT points & track your Rewards
Get exclusive offers

Say hello to fresh new features! Check out some the new adds to the Express App. Download it now & check it out.
• Create or sign in to your Express account with just a tap from a social network account
• Link your Express and EXPRESS NEXT accounts for easier management
• Have some fun with our augmented reality (AR) in our latest Express mailer

We’ve updated the APP to make holiday shopping easier than ever.
    •    Holiday Gift Guide – A curated gift guide for quick and painless holiday shopping.
    •    Apple Pay – Complete your order faster with Apple Pay.
    •    Bug fixes – You spoke, we listened. We’ve made improvements based on your feedback.

'Tis the season! We're continuing to update the app to make holiday shopping better than ever.
 
We also want to hear from you! Please reach us at appsupport@express.com to let us know how we're doing and what you would like to see next!

We’ve fixed some bugs and made a few minor changes. Based on the feedback we’re getting from you, we are planning to deliver you an even better app in 2018! 
Please continue to send us your thoughts and feedback at appsupport@express.com to let us know how we’re doing and what you would like to see next!

What a way to kick off the new year! The app now includes support for iPhone X along with several under-the-hood changes to improve the overall stability and customer experience within the app.

Please continue to send us your feedback and suggestions to appsupport@express.com and let us know how we’re doing and what you would like to see next!

We love giving and now you can too! We've added the ability for you to gift any product we have (except giftcards) to any person of your choosing. Learn more about it by selecting "Send as a Gift" from the Info Menu (bottom left icon) on any product page.

Please continue to send us your feedback and suggestions to appsupport@express.com and let us know how we’re doing and what you would like to see next!

With Spring just about behind us, we’re looking forward to Summer! With this release, the app now:

- Makes it easier for you to know when you have an Express NEXT Reward available
- Allows you to customize the gift card experience 
- Improves the viewing and access of your Express NEXT Credit Card account

As always, we are continuing to review your feedback (appsupport@express.com) and making changes to improve the overall stability and customer experience within the app.

Summer is here - that means goodbye to sweaters and hello to swimsuits! With this release, we’ve changed how you view all of our amazing products so that you can easily pick out that perfect summer look.

As always, your feedback (sent to appsupport@express.com and within the app) is what helps us determine how to improve the overall stability and customer experience… so keep them coming!

Sweater weather is here which means the holiday season is just around the corner! We’ve updated the app to make it easier for you to experience our brand your away. Whether you’re looking for our latest deals or exploring the season’s trends, we’ve got you covered.

Your feedback (sent to appsupport@express.com and within the app) is what has helped us create the best version of the app for you. So thank you… and keep it coming!

Brrr, goodbye Polar Vortex, you won’t be missed! With this release, we’ve made some big improvements to My Express and My Profile, making it easier to navigate through them both. We’ve also made some other minor changes to improve the customer experience within the app.

Feedback or suggestions you’d like to share? We’d love to hear! Please send it to appsupport@express.com so we can continue to improve your experience!

Introducing Klarna!
Shop now. Pay later.
Shop with confidence. Get the pieces you love with 4 interest-free payments.
How It Works
1.​ Enter your shipping and billing details and choose Klarna at checkout.
2.​ Your first payment is collected when the order is shipped.
3.​ The remaining three payments will automatically processed every 2 weeks.

Customers can now split Express App orders between Ship to Home and Store Pickup, so you can get the styles you want, whenever and wherever.

Updates and improvements made to:

·     Checkout
·     Order Confirmation
·     Order History
·     Order Tracking
·     Returns

We made enhancements to our order tracking and Buy Online, Pick Up In Store customer experience.
	•	Faster, easier ways to purchase online and pick up in store
	•	See which items in your bag are available in stores
	•	New split delivery/pick-up options for single orders
	•	Smoother experience for selecting style sizes and colors
	•	Text notifications for app orders

Introducing Free Shipping & Returns at Express!

	•	Qualified loyalty customers* may be awarded Free Shipping, Free Returns, or both!
	•	Qualified customers will see a banner in their bag that informs them which, if any, offer they are qualified for
	•	For customers that do not qualify for, they will see a banner informing them they can still get free shipping by ordering >$50 of products

Disclaimer: 

Free Shipping & Returns offer is valid on orders placed at express.com for U.S. Standard Shipping. No promo code required to redeem free shipping, just select Standard Shipping during checkout. If an expedited shipping method is chosen, Second Day Delivery or Overnight Delivery, the stated shipping and handling fees will apply. Offer is subject to change without notice.  Not valid on Express Marketplace items, Style Trial transactions or previous purchases. Gift cards are shipped separately from merchandise items; there is no shipping & handling charge for gift cards delivered via Standard Delivery.  When a single order results in multiple shipments, the shipping and handling charge only applies to the first package shipped. There is no additional charge for subsequent shipments for the same order.

If an expedited shipping method is chosen, Second Day Delivery or Overnight Delivery, the stated shipping and handling fees will apply. Offer is subject to change without notice.  Not valid on Express Marketplace items, Style Trial transactions or previous purchases. Gift cards are shipped separately from merchandise items; there is no shipping & handling charge for gift cards delivered via Standard Delivery.  When a single order results in multiple shipments, the shipping and handling charge only applies to the first package shipped. There is no additional charge for subsequent shipments for the same order.

Glad you asked. We’ve updated the app a bit and added some new stuff:

  •   Shop made-for-you outfits in certain product pages
  •   New tiers for the Express Insider program 
       ⁃  Insider tier
           •  Welcome to a whole new world of rewards and access. Earn points just for shopping and get free stuff.
       ⁃  Influencer tier
           •  Everything you get with the Insider tier + higher point accrual rate + annual birthday gift
       ⁃  A-List tier
           •  Everything you get with the Influencer tier + HIGHER point accrual rate + BIGGER birthday gift
  •   Insider access + offers just for you 
  •   Added bug fixes

What’s new?

Glad you asked. We’ve updated the app a bit and added some new stuff:

• Sending Gift Cards: Purchase digital Express gift cards in the app or send one IRL with free shipping.
• Easier Photo Uploading: Hashtag your social media photos with #ExpressYou and tag @Express or upload straight from your phone for a chance to be featured on our site.
• Bug fixing.
